title: Fantasy RPG Music Collection - Kingdom Arise
description: High quality orchestral music collection ready to use in fantasy video game.
longDescription:
Fantasy RPG Music Collection â€“ Kingdom Arise

This music pack contains 110 professionally composed, produced and mixed audio files made from 10 tracks. A combination of storytelling, combat and exploration music makes Kingdom Arise complete soundtrack for your next fantasy video game.


SOUNDCLOUD DEMO


Ready to go:

Full tracks, intros, long loops and short loops included.


Safe to use:

All of my music is royalty free and streaming friendly. You can be sure that streamers will not get copyright claim from YouTube, Twitch, etc. while streaming your game with my music.


Check my other Fantasy music pack:

Big Fantasy RPG Music Bundle

Number of Audio Wavs: 110

Supported Development Platforms: All
